pages.title: Creating Life
pages.text: It has always been the dream of people to create artificial life. Since you are now dealing with magical gems yourself, which seem to have magical powers, this should be a piece of cake.

The raw magical powers, which are bundled by the gems, are the best starting point for such research.$(br)Since you seem to be immortal (last time a green pig walking upright surprised you, you woke up in your own bed the next morning), you have all the time in the world to think about it.$(br2)It's time for... experiments!
